record.field: for o in object.browse(context.get('active_ids', [])): o.reconciled = True

move_ids = context.get('active_ids', []) without_attachment_move_ids = [] attach_obj = env['ir.attachment'] for move in move_ids: if not attach_obj.search([('type', '=', 'binary'), ('res_model', '=', 'account.move'), ('res_id', '=', move)]): without_attachment_move_ids.append(move) action = { 'type': 'ir.actions.act_window', 'res_model': 'account.move', 'view_type': 'form', 'view_mode': 'tree,form', 'domain': [('id', 'in', without_attachment_move_ids)], 'target': 'current', 'context': {}, }
